name: FastRPC
description: This DevTools extension adds another panel that shows decoded FastRPC requests. Works for both requests and responses and can be used to copy request/response data to clipboard. Implements the FastRPC protocol (https://github.com/seznam/fastrpc/wiki/FastRPC-binary-protocol-specification) v1, v2 and v3. The extension also works in Firefox and is already available at MozAddons: https://addons.mozilla.org/cs/firefox/addon/fastrpc/
